# Exercise 1

## Q1
```{r}
#| message: false
spotify <- vroom(here("data", "top-spotify-songs-from-20102019-by-year.csv"))
```
## Q2
Number of songs
```{r}
spotify |> 
  distinct(title) |>
  nrow()
```

Number of artists
```{r}
spotify |>
  distinct(artist) |>
  nrow()
```

Number of genres
```{r}
spotify |>
  distinct(`top genre`) |>
  nrow()
```
## Q3
```{r}
spotify |>
  group_by(year) |>
  summarise(n = n())
```
## Q4
```{r}
spotify |>
  group_by(artist) |>
  distinct(title) |>
  summarise(n = n()) |>
  arrange(-n) |>
  slice(1)
```
